item.title: Allyson add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description:
"People think a soul mate is your perfect fit, and that's what everyone wants. But a true soul mate is a mirror, the person who shows you everything that is holding you back, the person who brings you to your own attention so you can change your life.
A true soul mate is probably the most important person you'll ever meet, because they tear down your walls and smack you awake. But to live with a soul mate forever? Nah. Too painful. Soul mates, they come into your life just to reveal another layer of yourself to you, and then leave.
A soul mates purpose is to shake you up, tear apart your ego a little bit, show you your obstacles and addictions, break your heart open so new light can get in, make you so desperate and out of control that you have to transform your life, then introduce you to your spiritual master..." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Allyson add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "This is a good sign, having a broken heart. It means we have tried for something." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Allyson add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "Tis' better to live your own life imperfectly than to imitate someone else's perfectly." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Allyson add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "I think I deserve something beautiful." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Allyson add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
Allyson add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "In desperate love, we always invent the characters of our partners, demanding they be what we need of them, and then feeling devastated when they refuse to perform the role we created in the first place." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Allyson add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "Having a baby is like getting a tattoo on your face. You really need to be certain it's what you want before you commit." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Allyson add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "I am a better person when I have less on my plate." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Allyson add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "That’s the thing about a human life-there’s no control group, no way to ever know how any of us would have turned out if any variables had been changed." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Allyson add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "But never again use another person's body or emotions as a scratching post for your own unfulfilling yearnings." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Allyson add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "I crossed the street to walk in the sunshine." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Allyson add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "[Italian men] are like show poodles. Sometimes they look so good I want to applaud." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Allyson add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "We don't realize that, somewhere within us all, there does exist a supreme self who is eternally at peace." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Allyson add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "Until I can feel as ecstatic about having a baby as I felt about going to New Zealand to search for giant squid, I cannot have a baby." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Allyson add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "A soul mates purpose is to shake you up, tear apart your ego a little bit, show you your obstacles and addictions, break your heart open so new light can get in, make you so desperate and out of control that you have to transform your life, then introduce you to your spiritual master..." -- Elizabeth Gilbert
